name: Vavio
description:
Vavio is a game about surviving the music. Excited for that beat drop that you can feel coming up? You probably shouldn't be. That usually means a lot of hurty things are about to come flying at you. But it's kinda cool because it happens in sync with the music, right? I mean, I think it's neato, but I'm just the guy who made the game, so I'm a little biased. But it's fun! And polished! People seem to enjoy it, which makes me happy inside.

This is my first Real Game™ that I've spent a significant amount of time on (after >6 years of only unfinished projects and game jams), and I'm super proud of it! Please tell me what you think by leaving a comment or tweeting at me! I'm always open to constructive criticism.

Anyway, I hope you enjoy Vavio. I worked pretty hard on it, and it's kind of my baby.

Oh, and you can go into the /Data/StreamingAssets/ folder and modify the text/audio files that dictate the spawning of enemies and their bullet patterns, if you like. I made sure to let those files be editable so people can screw around with them if they want :)
